summary.para: Handles events that occur when the integer value of an animation variable changes in the specified dimension.

param.name: storyboard
param.para: The storyboard that is animating the animation variable specified by the variable parameter.

param.name: variable
param.para: The animation variable that has been updated.

param.name: newValue
param.para: The new integer value of the animation variable.
Note The rounding mode for an animation variable is specified using the method.

param.name: previousValue
param.para: The previous integer value of the animation variable.
Note The rounding mode for an animation variable is specified using the method.

param.name: cDimension
param.para: The dimension in which the integer value of the animation variable changed.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

remarks.para: This method receives updates as INT32 values. To receive updates as DOUBLE values, use the method.
OnIntegerValueChanged events might occur less frequently than events because values such as 2.2, 2.3, and 2.4 would all be rounded to the same integer.

summary.para: Defines a method for handling animation variable update events. IUIAnimationVariableIntegerChangeHandler2 handles events that occur in a specified dimension.
